p: Rosin-oil dimer acids mixture can be prepared from rosin and industrial fatty oils according to Scheme 48, prior to washing and rotary evaporation [ 219]. It can be used for preparation of a liquid thermal stabilizer [ 219]. It is noteworthy, that dimerized rosin is usually produced separately and can be applied in acrylic adhesives [ 220, 221] to improve their wetting, adhesion and thermal stability [ 220].
